item.title: Comment on Boys’ Abstract Harmony Knit Topi by Alok Dhakal
item.dc:creator: Alok Dhakal
item.description: The Boys' Abstract Harmony Knit Topi exceeded my expectations with its unique design and cozy feel. My son loves wearing it and it keeps him warm during the colder days. Highly recommended!
item.content:encoded: The Boys’ Abstract Harmony Knit Topi exceeded my expectations with its unique design and cozy feel. My son loves wearing it and it keeps him warm during the colder days. Highly recommended!

item.title: Comment on Boys’ Abstract Harmony Knit Topi by Rajendra Shrestha
item.dc:creator: Rajendra Shrestha
item.description: The Boys' Abstract Harmony Knit Topi is a trendy and comfortable accessory that perfectly combines style and warmth for boys, making it a must-have for the winter season.
item.content:encoded: The Boys’ Abstract Harmony Knit Topi is a trendy and comfortable accessory that perfectly combines style and warmth for boys, making it a must-have for the winter season.

item.title: Comment on Sunny Tails Knit Topi by Binod Karki
item.dc:creator: Binod Karki
item.description: I'm in love with the Sunny Tails Knit Topi! The orange color is so bright and eye-catching, perfect for adding a pop of color to my baby's outfit. The two tails are super cute and add a playful touch. It's soft, comfortable, and keeps my little one's head warm. I couldn't be happier with this topi!
item.content:encoded: I’m in love with the Sunny Tails Knit Topi! The orange color is so bright and eye-catching, perfect for adding a pop of color to my baby’s outfit. The two tails are super cute and add a playful touch. It’s soft, comfortable, and keeps my little one’s head warm. I couldn’t be happier with this topi!

item.title: Comment on Sunny Tails Knit Topi by Sabina Shakya
item.dc:creator: Sabina Shakya
item.description: The Sunny Tails Knit Topi is absolutely adorable! The vibrant orange color is so cheerful, and the two tails make it even more charming. It keeps my baby's head warm and cozy, and the quality is excellent. I love how stylish and unique it is. Highly recommend!
item.content:encoded: The Sunny Tails Knit Topi is absolutely adorable! The vibrant orange color is so cheerful, and the two tails make it even more charming. It keeps my baby’s head warm and cozy, and the quality is excellent. I love how stylish and unique it is. Highly recommend!

item.title: Comment on Baby Bliss Knit Topi by Kanchan Magar
item.dc:creator: Kanchan Magar
item.description: I love the Baby Bliss Knit Topi! The green, blue, and pink options are so charming, and the quality is excellent. They fit my baby perfectly and keep their head warm during chilly days. These topis are not only practical but also stylish. Highly recommended for any baby!
item.content:encoded: I love the Baby Bliss Knit Topi! The green, blue, and pink options are so charming, and the quality is excellent. They fit my baby perfectly and keep their head warm during chilly days. These topis are not only practical but also stylish. Highly recommended for any baby!

item.title: Comment on Baby Bliss Knit Topi by Sita Tamang
item.dc:creator: Sita Tamang
item.description: The Baby Bliss Knit Topi is simply adorable! The colors are vibrant, and the soft and cozy woolen material keeps my baby's head warm and comfortable. They are the perfect addition to any baby's wardrobe, adding a touch of cuteness to every outfit.
item.content:encoded: The Baby Bliss Knit Topi is simply adorable! The colors are vibrant, and the soft and cozy woolen material keeps my baby’s head warm and comfortable. They are the perfect addition to any baby’s wardrobe, adding a touch of cuteness to every outfit.

item.title: Comment on Emerald Oasis Knit Topi by Dipendra Sharma
item.dc:creator: Dipendra Sharma
item.description: I absolutely love the Emerald Oasis Knit Topi! The green color is so beautiful and the knit design is stunning. It's a comfortable and stylish headwear option that perfectly combines tradition and fashion. Highly recommended for Muslim individuals seeking a unique and elegant cap.
item.content:encoded: I absolutely love the Emerald Oasis Knit Topi! The green color is so beautiful and the knit design is stunning. It’s a comfortable and stylish headwear option that perfectly combines tradition and fashion. Highly recommended for Muslim individuals seeking a unique and elegant cap.

item.title: Comment on Emerald Oasis Knit Topi by Anjali Pokharel
item.dc:creator: Anjali Pokharel
item.description: The Emerald Oasis Knit Topi is a must-have for Muslim individuals. The green color is vibrant and the knit pattern is intricate, adding a touch of elegance. It's comfortable and breathable, making it perfect for religious occasions.
item.content:encoded: The Emerald Oasis Knit Topi is a must-have for Muslim individuals. The green color is vibrant and the knit pattern is intricate, adding a touch of elegance. It’s comfortable and breathable, making it perfect for religious occasions.

item.title: Comment on Jolly Holly Knit Topi by Pooja Rai
item.dc:creator: Pooja Rai
item.description: I love the Jolly Holly Knit Topi! It's so cute and Christmassy. The red color and holly pattern are delightful, and it adds a touch of holiday magic to my outfits. Highly recommend for spreading Christmas cheer!
item.content:encoded: I love the Jolly Holly Knit Topi! It’s so cute and Christmassy. The red color and holly pattern are delightful, and it adds a touch of holiday magic to my outfits. Highly recommend for spreading Christmas cheer!

item.title: Comment on Jolly Holly Knit Topi by Nisha Sherpa
item.dc:creator: Nisha Sherpa
item.description: The Jolly Holly Knit Topi is the perfect Christmas accessory. The vibrant red color and holly design make me feel festive and merry. It keeps me warm and stylish during the holiday season.
item.content:encoded: The Jolly Holly Knit Topi is the perfect Christmas accessory. The vibrant red color and holly design make me feel festive and merry. It keeps me warm and stylish during the holiday season.
